text: “obage at (dænata yuddha nokara) valakvaminda, salataya (sthira vasayen) itu karaminda, sakataya gevaminda sitinu” yayi kavurun hata kiyanu læbuveda, ovunva (nabiye!) oba dutuve nædda? yuddha karanu yayi ovunta niyoga karanu læbu vita, ovungen ek samuhayak nam, allahta biya vannak men, nætahot itat vada vædiyen minisunta biya vi “apage deviyane! æyi apa kerehi yuddhaya niyama karanne? tavat tika davasakata (meya) kal dæmiya yutu noveda?”yi pævasuha. (meyata nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “melova jivitaya itamat alpaya! kavurun (allahta) biya vi katayutu karanneda, ohuta paralova (jivitaya)ma itamat aganeya. (obage pin adu kara ho papaya vædi kara ho) oba ek anu pramanayakinvat aparadha karanu nolabannehuya”
